author: remm
msg: - Don't set content-type when the reporter is null.

author: craigmcc
msg: Make o.a.c.{Group,User} extend java.security.Principal so that they fit more
easily into environments that like to deal with Principals (like JAAS
LoginModules).  Create a Role interface (and simple implementation) that
also implements Principal for the same reason.

author: craigmcc
msg: Flesh out the implementation of JAASRealm so that we can still be reasonably
independent of the way that the JAAS LoginModule is actually implemented.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add definitions of the "className" attribute so that tools can see it.

author: craigmcc
